text: I only have the one list, and yes I'm in it

For the private content templates, the sign out and access denied template options are the "page" template type and not a system template type. Since "page" templates so up as available to use in website and landing pages. This seems confusing to me.
you can control where the login redirects in the settings for Private content. Settings>Website>Private Content under Default destinations after each action

is there a way to resend the registration email via workflow? We have people that fill out a form to get access to our private content with a workflow adding them to the access list. However, some don't complete the step of creating a password. The forgot password doesn't work for them. They have to contact the admin for them to manually resend the registration.
